reviews.review_msg: Absolutely worst professor I ever had. Not only does he gaslight his students, he is unclear about class work material. Furthermore, he is rude and dismissive to questions students may have. I would not take his class unless you want to get bullied by your professor.
loved his class. the best prof i ever had! could be a role model for many others!
Huai is the best. Period. He does not only teach you the course; he also teaches you the philosophy of life and how to be a kind and wise person.
Huai is fun, knowledgeable, and patient, the best teacher I've ever had! Truly enjoyed the semester.
Probably the worst class I ever took. Dismissive and rude to the point I went to the dean of UBCs GRSJ about him. Easy marks though if you can sit through his uninformed rants.

Great course, but too much to read. Class was fun, informative, thought-provoking. Loved the in-class debate, very intense! Professor liked students with great attendance so if you miss a lot you will not likely get a good grade for the exams.

Awful class. Offensive about sensitive issues such as gender identities and would show movies with trigger scenes without telling anyone what they were going to be watching. No books were read, he just showed youtube clips and told us his opinions about topics that had no real relation to the course
What can I say? I miss Huai's class already! I have told all my friends at UBC about Huai's GRSJ224, the best course I've ever taken! Truly learned a lot! He is the best prof I ever known at UBC!

The best prof and the best course! The videos we watched were tangible learning materials, more interesting (and easier to understand and digest) than those long and boring readings. I have learned from this course more than any other courses that I have taken at UBC. The prof was fun, knowledgeable and had faith in his students.

one of the best professors I ever had at ubc. I got an amazing grade. He really encouraged us to do the best we could, and he had a lot of faith in his students. Take this professor :) he is amazing. The class structure is very unusual at first because we watch videos consistently, but I feel like I learned a lot in this class.
Great course and great prof! Super entertaining and informative. Got my first A+ from the course and it has totally changed my life. Thank you UBC.

I loved this course! It was informative, entertaining and thought-provoking. Great professor, fair marker, serious but very helpful and spent a lot of time answering my questions. I have decided to switch to gender studies now!

This is the most interesting course I have ever taken at ubc! Knowledgable prof, helpful and passionate about teaching. Well published and encouraged his students to get their work published. The course was informative and expanded my breadth of knowledge in such a short period of time.

Just loved this course. Would highly recommend to all! The professor is one of the best I've met at UBC, knowledgable, passionate, and charismatic. He also invited guest speakers to the class, and used movies and video clips and photos to help us digest the course content. He did not only teach, he also made me want to learn!

Terrible professor; unclear and would not explain important topics and issues thoroughly; highly misleading and misinforming. It was like listening to an online blogger teach us, always gave just general overviews. No reading materials, just used YOUTUBE VIDEOS and film trailers.
Awesome instructor. Full of passion and always ready to help. Knows his material and unintentionally funny. Can't ask more!

Probably the worst class I have taken at SFU. I took this course online and thought it would be a GPA booster but it definitely wasn't! This course took up more time than my three third year classes. TM was Sarah Sparks and she handed back assignments late constantly claiming she was "sick". I would not recommend this class to anyone!
